content.title: Secondary Battery Systems
content.fullText: Battery energy storage systems (BESS) and associated battery systems, as defined in AS/NZS 5139, shall comply with AS/NZS 5139. All other secondary battery systems, as defined in the scope of AS 3011 (series), installed in buildings, structures, or premises such as those with critical power continuity requirements (e.g., for telecommunications, uninterruptible power supplies (UPS), hospitals, sub-stations, and black start) that are outside the scope of AS/NZS 5139 shall comply with AS 3011 (series).
